headline: BLE RESPECT AUTOMATIC PHOTORESIST DEVELOPER
description: System is designed exclusively to develop and bake substrates  using spinning and heating techniques BLE was acquired by Suss Microtec
specstable:
Manufacturer Suss MicroTec
Model Respect 600
Description Automatic Photoresist Developer
Wafer Size Range
Set Size 150 mm
Other Information 400 V 16 A 50 Hz
System features
  • Programmable controller
  • PC with windows NT4SP6 and applications program Respect 1.0b0087/1.1b0002
  • Touch screen
  • RS 232 Interface
  • Vacuum monitoring
  • External cabinet exhaust connection
  • Automatic exhaust control
  • Media control panel
  • Step up transformer; 208 to 400 Volt 3 Ph
Condition Excellent
Power Requirements 208 V 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 48.000 in (121.9 cm)
Depth 29.000 in (73.7 cm)
Height 62.000 in (157.5 cm)
Weight 880 lb (399 kg)
